data.title: Yummy
data.text: We wondered in there one evening and was pleasantly surprised!  This is not only yogurt but ice cream also.  It was very clean and the Service was very nice, even had a few chuckles as the server tried to guess our favorite!!!  He also made suggestions of something we might want to taste.  Fun little place!

data.title: Sandwich for Two
data.text: When we arrived in Carlsbad, we wanted a sandwich so when we walked around, we found Linda's Frozen Yogurt next to our condo.  The sandwich was huge!  two of us split one with a package of chips and an iced tea and were more than filled!

data.title: Graet yogurt, ice cream andsandwhich choices
data.text: Must for ice cream and yogurt selections. Must for sandwiches and friendly staff. Hard to walk past when you look at choices of desert options and ice cream add ons !

data.title: They have DOLE WHIPS!
data.text: Just had a smoothie with Dole Whip as the base. So good, I almost ordered another.  If you don't know, Dole Whip is a frozen pineapple slush.  On the east coast where I live, the only place I know that has it is disney world.

data.title: great sandwiches
data.text: This place has great yogurt and dici out ice cream but they Aldo have Awesome sandwiches. Very friendly!

data.title: Large serving sizes
data.text: There's always a line out the door because it's that good.  Large serving sizes with generous portions of toppings.

data.title: Waste of money and calories
data.text: I was so looking forward to a real malted on a hot day last year. With traffic, I figured I would just walk up the street to Linda's. What a disappointment. The malt had NO flavor, NO thickness and cost over $6.00. Guess I will walk further to cold stone!

data.title: Fun and tasty
data.text: I enjoyed the fast service. The selection wasn't 31 flavours deep, but it was cold and generous. I really enjoyed the service as it was first class, and they gave me a military discount!  Great deal!

data.title: great service!
data.text: Right across the parking lot of our resort so we enjoyed lots of yogurt desserts!!!  Lots of variety!

data.title: Nice Place for an ice cream or yogurt treat
data.text: A nice little shoppe near the Daily News Cafe.  They offer deli sandwiches, coffee, ice cream, yogurt and other treats.  The staff is very friendly and the prices reasonable.  If you stay at the Tamarack Beach Resort in town, you will receive a 20% discount off your total bill (which we did!).  A nice simple quick service treat.  My wife and I both had the Birthday Cake flavor which was very good.  I would go to a nice locally owned place like Linda's than a chain store any day.

data.title: soso
data.text: this was so so.  I prefer the Cold Stone down the street. better selection and better flavor.   2 block walk from this one.

data.title: Nice little place
data.text: Good choice with a few chairs outside, very polite staff & helpful. Worth stopping by if your near you'll love it.

data.title: local flavor
data.text: small local shop with quality food, ice cream and yogurt.  Great place to relax and have a very nice lunch, quiet and relaxing with friendly staff.

data.title: Unsweet sweets
data.text: Wow, how does this place stay in business? Because too many tourists see it as a quick sweet after dinner when they walk around the Carlsbad Village. Best to go to the new Gelato place near Land and Water OR even Coldstone! They serve junky dreyers! Nothing special at all. Had a milk shake and it was watery with no flavor. Had a yogurt next time, sandy tasting. No character here at all!

data.title: Love It
data.text: Great sandwiches, wraps, soups, salads, ice cream and yogurt.  Always enjoy the staff.  They are like family.

data.title: Ice Cream Stop
data.text: I LOVE ice cream and I mean LOVE. So this place was fine, not great. It's Dryers. So if you like speciality ice cream, real, hard dip, local ice cream, this isn't it. If you have a sweet tooth and want some run of the mill ice cream this will hit the spot.

data.title: All your worries go away once you try their waffle cone.
data.text: When I drive to Carlsbad, this is my first stop.  Why, because it is excellent.  They make their own waffle cones and the frozen yogurt is to die for.  Bring your appetite because those waffle cones are large.  All flavors are amazing.  The smell of those cones as you walk in mmmm. Right in the center of the village and once you purchase your ice cream, you can take a walk to the beach, a few hundred feet away.  What an amazing experience. This yogurt shop knows how to please my belly. Ideal for all ages.  Especially if you are having a bad day and you need a pick me up.  The flavors will make you forget you were even worried.

data.title: Jekyll and Hyde?
data.text:
Hubby and I took the grandkids to Linda's Yogurt for a treat. We were greeted by friendly mature staff who gave us as many yogurt samples as we wanted. We ordered shakes, ice cream in a bowl and cones. I had a small waffle cone. I was pleasantly surprised when she handed me my cone. It was huge!!! Hubby's cake cone was topped off with a ton of frozen yogurt too.
On the recommendation of our van driver hubby and I decided to go back the next day for lunch. We each ordered a sandwich and hubby ordered the chicken soup of the day. 
When our sandwiches were delivered I noticed a long black hair on my plate. (The young gal making the sandwiches had long black hair.) I took the sandwich back and showed her the hair. She pulled the hair off the plate and didn't say anything just looked at the hair. No apology but asked if I wanted another sandwich. I really didn't, but took a new one anyway (but I watched to make sure I was getting a fresh one.) A fella brought my sandwich out and did say he was sorry. No mention of any kind of compensation for the hair.
Needless to say we will never be going back and wouldn't recommend this place for lunch.

data.title: Great sandwiches and ice cream, great service.
data.text: A very small sandwich and ice cream shop (but nice sized sandwiches and toppings) with a large selection of both. Always pleasant service.

data.title: Totally enjoyed ourselves here - went back the next day!
data.text: My husband and I visited Linda's for lunch on Friday and took our daughter and her family with us the next day. The fresh sandwiches were so tasty... and very large. We enjoyed some of the creamiest ice cream we have eaten in a long time. Easy to find, open and airy, it was a pleasant place for lunch. The staff were so friendly and helpful. But don't be in a hurry if you are eating sandwiches; they are made fresh and fresh takes time. If we were staying longer we would be hard pressed to walk past without treating ourselves to more ice cream!
